meanings.definition: Cutgrasses: grasses that are cut or mown
meanings.sent1: The farmer gathered the cutgrasses to feed his animals.
meanings.sent2: After the lawn was mowed, the cutgrasses smelled fresh.
meanings.sent3: The cutgrasses decided to rebel against the lawnmower.
meanings.sent4: The field of cutgrasses resembled a neatly trimmed carpet.
meanings.sent5: The children played hide-and-seek among the cutgrasses.

meanings.definition: Cutgrasses: the act of cutting or mowing grasses
meanings.sent1: The cutgrasses in the park happen every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the cutgrasses could be heard across the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The cutgrasses competition was fierce among the landscaping companies.
meanings.sent4: The cutgrasses seemed to dance under the rhythmic motion of the mower.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cutgrasses filled the air after the gardener finished.
